data.title: National policy committee meets to discuss dead dugong
data.description: The National Policy and Planning Committee on Marine and Coastal Resources Management met on Monday to discuss the dugong crisis after an alarming increase in the dugong death rate over the past month.

data.title: Probe begins into cat poisoning scene in Thai drama
data.description: The Department of Livestock Development has begun investigating possible animal cruelty involving a drugged cat in the production of a Thai period drama.

data.title: A diverse culinary adventure
data.description: Singapore is the island that keeps on giving in terms of culinary fare.

data.title: Thailand’s beloved baby hippo conquers hearts at COP29
data.description: Moo Deng woos visitors to the Thai pavilion’s showcase at the 29th United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP29) in Baku, Azerbaijan

data.title: Pyramid scheme charges filed against 18 The iCon Group suspects
data.description: The Department of Special Investigation additionally charged 18 detained suspects of  The iCon Group  with  pyramid scheme  and direct sales law violations.

data.title: Thailand to push for collaboration and financial support at COP29
data.description: Natural Resources and Environment Minister Chalermchai Sri-on to confirm Thailand’s commitment to dealing with climate change

data.title: No ‘secret deal’ with Cambodia over disputed Gulf areas: Phumtham
data.description: Defence minister rejects rumours that Thaksin Shinawatra signed a deal with ex-Cambodian PM Hun Sen over the development of overlapping claims areas in the Gulf of Thailand

data.title: Indonesia refutes charges it recognised Beijing’s sea claims
data.description: Indonesia denied that it had effectively recognised China’s disputed claims in the South China Sea after a joint statement with Beijing over developing contested areas came under fierce criticism.

data.title: Minister of transport halts 49-billion-baht expressway project
data.description: Project would connect the Si Rat Expressway to Ngamwongwan and Prasert Manukit roads, but financial study indicated it would yield negative returns

data.title: Malaysia's security council to decide on border wall
data.description: The decision whether to build a proposed border wall in Malaysia along the riverbank across from Narathiwat province in Thailand will be made by Malaysia

data.title: Four arrested for B8m robbery of Ukrainian
data.description: Police have arrested four  foreign suspects  in the 8-million-baht  crypto currency armed holdup  of a  Ukrainian  in Phuket.

data.title: Red Bull Skate Park at Benjakitti Park | The Nation in Brief
data.description: If you're still hyped about the exciting skateboarding events at the Olympic Games Paris 2024, today we're taking you to explore how this project is redefining Thai skateboard culture.

data.title: Thai wheelchair- racing athlete explains ban for anti-doping violation
data.description: Prawat Wahoram says he never used banned substances, and ban resulted from missing tests through oversight

data.title: Relaxation and Rejuvenation The Salil Hotel Riverside
data.description: The Salil Hotel Riverside – Bangkok offers more than just riverside accommodations; it provides an experience rooted in the "Journey of Dreams" concept, elevating hospitality through six essential components: Stay, Taste, Relax, Shop, Socialize, and Work.

data.title: Sin at new heights
data.description: Avani+ Riverside Bangkok Hotel will open Sin, Bangkok

data.title: Bangkokians urged to mask up as PM2.5 levels hit dangerous zones
data.description: Air pollution rises beyond safe limits in several districts of the capital, prompting the Bangkok Metropolitan Administration to issue a warning

data.title: Fresh typhoon hits northern Philippines as crop damage rises
data.description: A tropical storm that strengthened over the weekend made landfall as a typhoon in the northern Philippines, as the country grapples with millions of dollars in crop damage from a series of relentless cyclones this year.

data.title: Fabricio Andrade dares Jonathan Haggerty to fight him in MMA as he gets set for ONE Championship return
data.description: Fabricio Andrade has dared Jonathan Haggerty to carry out his threat of chasing him down to MMA, as he finally gets set to return to ONE Championship.

data.title: 2 key Bangkok motorways to be toll-free during New Year holidays
data.description: Toll waiver on Bangkok-Chonburi-Pattaya and outer ring road to  be effective from December 26 to January 2 in a bid to ease congestion

data.title: Govt denies Thai-Cambodian run-ins on Koh Kut
data.description: The government dismissed reports of confrontations between Thai soldiers and their Cambodian counterparts on  Koh Kut  as fake news while insisting the tourism situation on the island is still good.

data.title: World Film Series in Bangkok ends with Romanian movie
data.description: The 2024 Contemporary World Film Series will conclude with the screening of 6.9 On The Richter Scale, at TK Park

data.title: Demetrious Johnson called out for ‘fourth dance’ in ONE Championship by Adriano Moraes
data.description: Adriano Moraes has tried to lure Demetrious Johnson out of retirement for a “fourth dance” after making his long-awaited return to ONE Championship in style.
